overview: When a struggling artist discovers his muse, his creativity is stimulated like never before. However when the inspiration leaves him, he moves heaven and earth to not leave this project unfinished.
tagline: It follows Mercy, a young boy who lives in a poor neighborhood with his ill mom who can not afford the medical attention she needs. Mercy comes up with a creative way to raise money for his mom and that's by creating a Yard sale in his front yard.
title: Unfinshed
